DOC.brief_summary: An investigation into long term weight maintenance using a high protein or high carbohydrate diet, after a large and rapid weight loss.
DOC.brief_title: A High Protein Diet and Weight Maintenance
DOC.criteria: healthy men and women with a BMI >27kg/m2 with comorbities or BMI >30kg/m2 people with Type II diabetes or other endocrine disorders, women who were pregnant or breastfeeding or planning to become pregnant
